acceptance-test-run.title: Invoking Podam on an Abstract class should return a null pojo
acceptance-test-run.name: invokingPodamOnAbstractClassShouldReturnANullPojo

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractTestPojo
Then the Pojo should be null
